item.title: Compile Linux Kernel (on Fedora), Pune Kernel Meetup Assignment
item.description: Pune Kernel Meetup Assignment. An assignment was given at Pune Kernel Meetup-January-2018, for people to get started with linux kernel. The assignment was to print “Hello World” as the first line in the kernel boot up. So here is the solution to this problem that I could find. The Solution. Here are the steps to print “Hello World” as the first line in the kernel bootup. Get the kernel source tree.
